src:
Psst, Sadio Mane Punya Rahasia Kesuksesan Jurgen Klopp
05 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sudah tiga tahun Sadio Mane bekerja sama dengan Jurgen Klopp di Liverpool. Waktu kebersamaan yang cukup lama membuatnya tahu rahasia di balik kesuksesan pelatih asal Jerman tersebut.
Sejauh ini, Klopp baru mempersembahkan satu trofi untuk the Reds. Namun trofi tersebut tak bisa dipandang remeh karena diraih dari ajang paling bergengsi di tanah Eropa, yakni Liga Champions.
Prestasi itu diraih pada musim lalu. Seperti yang diketahui, Liverpool berhasil mencapai penghujung kompetisi dengan menumbangkan tim-tim hebat seperti Barcelona. Di babak final, mereka sukses mengalahkan Tottenham dengan skor 2-0.
Pada musim ini, Klopp sedang berusaha membantu Liverpool untuk memutus kutukan nirgelar di Premier League. The Reds sekarang sedang menempati puncak klasemen dengan raihan 31 poin, unggul enam angka atas Manchester City yang merupakan juara bertahan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Psst, Sadio Mane Has the Secret of Jurgen Klopp's Success
05 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane has been working with Jurgen Klopp for three years in Liverpool. Long time together to let him know the secret behind the success of the German coach.
So far, Klopp has just presented a trophy for the Reds. But the trophy cannot be underestimated because it was won from the most prestigious event on European soil, the Champions League.
That achievement was achieved last season. As is known, Liverpool managed to reach the end of the competition by subverting great teams like Barcelona. In the final round, they successfully defeated Tottenham by a score of 2-0.
This season, Klopp is trying to help Liverpool to break the curse of the title in the Premier League. The Reds are now topping the standings with 31 points, six ahead of Manchester City, who are the defending champions.

Scroll down to read full information.
